channel.title: Reproducibility on Jason I. Preszler
channel.description: Recent content in Reproducibility on Jason I. Preszler

item.title: Re-Counting Classes
item.description: Edit 7/27/2018 I realized that MFL’s name change to WLC didn’t change the prefix of their courses, this broke my scrapper. Below is an updated post that deals with this. Back in early May, I wrote a post about scraping the College of Idaho catalog: Counting Classes. Below if the same post (boring…) except that the “current catalog” has been updated. This is really a demonstration of reproducibility, the upstream data has changed and ideally all my code still works.
